title: Network and Security Engineer
blurb: While at Morris Manning and Martin I have worn many hats: from deploying and maintaining firewalls and severs, or running data drops as a Network Engineer, building out rules for SEIM, DLP and Endpoint Protection solutions as a Security Engineer, or rolling out largescale projects such as phone systems or Azure cloud systems as a Project Manager. My skillset is extemly diverse and brings a fresh viewpoint to all teams I work with. Below is a short list of skills and respincibilities I have developed while at MMM
